description: The library to connect XOD to Blynk via Bluetooth (BLE).
name: blynk

@/blynk.description: Creates a blynk custom type value

@/init-ble-uart.description:
Initializes a BLE module connection. 
Connects to a Blynk application.  
Syncs with the application

BJ5kfIqY7.description: Triggers a synchronization with the application
BJ5kfIqY7.label: RUN

H1Li3Ovtm.description: Triggets a new connection to a Blynk application
H1Li3Ovtm.label: INIT

Skfea_wKX.description: A 32-digit token value of a Blynk project
Skfea_wKX.label: AUTH

rk65hdPYX.description: An UART interface to which BLE module is wired
rk65hdPYX.label: UART

@/read.description: Reads data from a blynk widget

Bk_JGPcK7.description: Virtual pin number of a widget
Bk_JGPcK7.label: VPIN

@/widget-led.description: Writes data to a blynk LED widget

H1-kwnot7.description: Virtual pin number of a LED widget
H1-kwnot7.label: VPIN

@/write.description: Writes data to a blynk widget

SJgoS9sF7.description: Virtual pin number of a widget
SJgoS9sF7.label: VPIN

Syn8hRoFX.description: Data to wrtite to a widget
Syn8hRoFX.label: DATA

r1mhH5sKQ.description: Writes data to a Blynk LED widget

@/example-smart-garage.description: The program for a smart garage model controlled by Blynk
